plot: Miguel Hilari returns to film his father's Andean village, Santiago de Okola, where the only remaining relative who still lives there is his uncle.
title: El corral y el viento
plot_es: Miguel Hilari returns to film his father's Andean village, Santiago de Okola, where the only remaining relative who still lives there is his uncle.
plot_en: Miguel Hilari returns to film his father's Andean village, Santiago de Okola, where the only remaining relative who still lives there is his uncle.
